name: The End of Eternity
summary:
The End of Eternity (1955) by Isaac Asimov is a science fiction novel, with mystery and thriller elements, on the subjects of time travel and social engineering.

The themes are very different from most of his robot and 'space opera' stories, and take a clever approach to time paradoxes.
info:
• 中文名: 永恒的终结
  • 出版社: Doubleday
  • 发售日: 1955
  • 作者: Isaac Asimov
